thi-ap3:1.2_0: I’ve created a realm of creeper.
thi-ap3:1.4_0: the Buddha’s bonds of the world.
thi-ap3:2.3_0: I pay homage to the Dhamma,
thi-ap3:3.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
thi-ap3:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
thi-ap3:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the nun Māgaṇḍiya.
thi-ap3:7.1_0: a third part of the senior monks, etc.
